content.rendered:
Directed by Peter Farrelly

Written by Peter Farrelly. Brian Hayes Currie. Pete Jones. Chick Donohue. J.T. Molloy

Star Zac Efron(Chickie Donohue). Russell Crowe(Arthur Coates). Jake Picking(Rick Duggan). Kyle Allen(Bobby Pappas). Archie Renaux(Tom Collins). Will Ropp(Kevin McLoone). Will Hochman(Tommy Minogue). Matt Cook(Lt. Habershaw). Kevin K. Tran(Hieu ‘Oklahoma’ (as Kevin Tran)). Ruby Ashbourne Serkis(Christine Donohue). Bill Murray(The Colonel). Kristin Carey(Mrs. Minogue). Paul Adelstein(Mr. Donohue). Shirleyann Kaladjian(Mrs. Donohue). Joe Adler(Red). Christopher Reed Brown(Noodle). MacGregor Arney(Brendan). Hal Cumpston(Leary). Branden Lindsay(Jimmy Burns (as Brandon Davon Lindsay)). Omari K. Chancellor(Erickson). Bobby Farrelly(Baby-Face (as Bob Farrelly)). Carlos Arroyo(Sgt. Major Perez). Kelvin Delgado(Gines). Thomas Jordan(Leasco). Phil Anthony Edwards(Duvall). Thai-Hoa Le(Bartender Hien (as Thai Hoa Le)). Deanna Russo(Correspondent Woelfel). James Laver(Correspondent Lewis (as James Michael Lawrence)). Paul Sloan(CIA Agent). Nguyen Viet Anh(ARVN Interpreter). Alex Huynh(Prisoner). Kevin Flynn(Seafarers Union Clerk). Sean Gildea(Drake Captain Beauchene). Goya Robles(Almeida). Bradley M. Hayes(Saigon MP). Brian Jarvis(Major Breuer). Tim Hoffmann(Private Nolan). Mike Hatton(Captain Dyer). Mike Gray(Lt. Fusco). Thomas Ronca(Cpl. Warner). Stephen Sweeney(Lt. Commander Washburn). Josefina Grajo Villanueva(Embassy Bureaucrat). Jackie Flynn(Major Flynn). James Fahselt(Mason). Anabel Graetz(Nanny). Ngo Hoang Long(Caravelle Porter). Lisa Rothschiller(Mrs. Collins). John Garrett Mahlmeister(LZ Jane Radio Operator). Michael Grant Selby(Jeep Soldier Soucy). Terry Mullany(Jeep Soldier Hardcastle). Alex Winters(Long Binh Private). Malik Tyshawn Louis(Long Binh Fireman). Mata Toure(Medic Molloy). Finn Gesner(Cool Breeze). Apple Kocsis(Protester #1 (as Apple Farrelly)). Rory Gesner(Protester #2). Carlie Mantilla(Protester #3). Alicia Jordan(Protester #4). Tuck Gesner(Protester #5). Henry Mortensen(Baby Killer Protester). Mariann Farrelly(Counter-Protester). Andrew Small(Parish Priest). J.B. Rogers(Drake First Mate). Simeon Drew Young(Military Truck Driver). Maverick Kang Jr.(Helicopter Pilot Miosky (as Maverick Kamuela Kang Jr.)). Le Minh Phuc(Saigon Cab Driver). Chananticha Chaipa(Little Girl). Nguyen Thi Thanh Thao(Vietnamese Mother). Duran Russell(Embassy Soldier). Pedro Correa(PFC William Sebast). Jake Mooney(SPC Charles Daniels (as Jacob Threlkeld Mooney)). Nguyen Van Vo(South Vietnam Field Force Officer). Andrew Muscato(Long Binh Gate Guard). Thanawat Jhongfakklang(Grieving Saigon Father). Kelsea Edgerly(Protester (uncredited)). Dennis W. Hall(Mr. Minogue (uncredited)). Phil Korz(Bar Patron (uncredited)). Caroline Plyler(Minogue Friend (uncredited)). Mark Rome(Protester (uncredited)). Rhett Sever(Mourner (uncredited)). Ron Smoorenburg(Soldier (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Oliver Ackermann. Karen Duffy. David Ellison. Brett Glatman. Dana Goldberg. Don Granger. Andrew Muscato. Jake Myers. J.B. Rogers. Joe Russo

Production Living Films. Skydance Media
